power.description: The namespace and ID of the power which will be checked for being active.
power.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the power which will be checked for being active.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md)

Checks whether the specified power is "active", meaning that the entity has the power and the power has all its conditions fulfilled.

Type ID: `origins:power_active`
